articles.title: Greetings to Zambian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Zambian President
						
 Pyongyang, October 24 (KCNA) -- President Kim Yong Nam of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Zambian President Michael Chilufya Sata on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of his country's independence.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries will grow stronger in the future, wishing the Zambian president and people success in their efforts for the nation's development and prosperity.
